titleStmt.title: The reasonablenesse of wise and holy truth: and the absurditie of foolish and wicked errour
titleStmt.author: Terry, John, 1555?-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield, and William Wrench, printers to the famous Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Title page mutilated, affecting imprint; title page through p. 7 from Bodleian Library copy filmed at end.
